channel.title: Disconnecting -
channel.description:
Ok, So here's the problem. - - Everytime i Run my server , after 5 minutes it goes offline, ; *That Mean's No one can connect too my server. - I got this in my Run.bat. [code]@echo off color 0a title Z A java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
Any Solutions on why it's disconnecting people from joining every 5 mins.
It's -317-

item.title: Disconnecting -
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
@Aeolian wrote:

Ok, So here’s the problem.

Everytime i Run my server , after 5 minutes it goes offline, ;
*That Mean’s No one can connect too my server.

I got this in my Run.bat.

@echo off color 0a title Z A java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Any Solutions on why it’s disconnecting people from joining every 5 mins.

It’s -317-
